title: Pixel 2 is stuck at Google screen. Tried with safe mode, recovery mode(Wipe data/factory reset)
content:
My Pixel 2 got powered off 2 days back and it was not turning on. Later, tried with safe mode and Data wipe/recovery mode as well. Even that did not help.

Right now, I can see Google screen and it is stuck there. Tried factory reset multiple times.

Pls help if anyone know a way out.
